===Etymology===
Appears to be from {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=さんざし}} {{m|zh|山查子|tr={{IPAchar|/srɛn dʒa tsi<sup>X</sup>/}}|lit=mountain + hawthorn + child, little thing}}.  The plant itself is native to China.

The modern standard form in {{etyl|zh|-}} is {{m|zh|山楂}}; compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} reading ''shānzhā'', {{etyl|yue|-}} ''saan<sup>1</sup> zaa<sup>1</sup>''.
